title: Update README with new command structure
description:
Document new tk run flags and cloud sync setup.

## README Updates

### Command Reference Section

```markdown
## Commands

### Running the Agent

\`\`\`bash
# Run agent on an epic
tk run <epic-id>

# Run agent with local board UI
tk run <epic-id> --board

# Run agent with cloud sync (includes board)
tk run <epic-id> --cloud

# Board only, no agent (review mode)
tk run --board
tk run --cloud
\`\`\`

### Cloud Sync Setup

1. Get a token from https://tickboard.dev/settings
2. Add to ~/.tickboardrc:
   \`\`\`
   token=your-token-here
   \`\`\`
3. Run with --cloud flag:
   \`\`\`bash
   tk run abc --cloud
   \`\`\`

Your ticks will sync in real-time to tickboard.dev.

### Deprecated Commands

\`\`\`bash
# Old (deprecated):
tk board
tk board --cloud

# New:
tk run --board
tk run --cloud
\`\`\`
```

### Cloud Section

```markdown
## Cloud Board

Access your ticks from anywhere at [tickboard.dev](https://tickboard.dev).

### How It Works

1. Local `tk run --cloud` connects to Durable Object
2. File changes sync to cloud in real-time (~50ms)
3. Cloud UI edits sync back to local
4. Works offline - changes queue and sync on reconnect

### Privacy

- Your ticks are stored in Cloudflare Durable Objects
- Only accessible with your token
- Project isolation enforced
- No telemetry or analytics
```
